title: Skidby Mill Walk Route

images.title: George Robinson / Skidby Mill buildings
images.caption: Skidby Mill buildings. While the splendid mill attracts the attention of photographers, the buildings around its base are well worth showing.

images.title: Peter Church / The Mill House, Skidby
images.caption: The Mill House. Restaurant and Deli Abruzzo. The lane in the right of the photograph leads up to the windmill.

images.title: Paul Lakin, CC BY 3.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Village, Main Street

description: This circular walk visits Skidby Windmill near Beverley, in the East Riding of Yorkshire. The Grade II listed mill dates back to 1821 and is a popular local attraction. Inside there's an interesting museum where you can learn all about the history of the area. You can start the walk at the good sized mill car park just to the south east of Skidby village centre. After exploring the mill you can then follow footpaths west to Gallows Hill and Eppleworth Hill. Head north from here and you can pick up a section of the Beverley Twenty and follow it east through the village centre where you will pass the 18th century St Michael's Church. The route then turns south to follow a road back to the mill car park.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: Head to the Millhouse for some refreshments after your walk. There's a fine restauarant here serving delicious modern British and European cuisine. It includes some beautifully landscaped gardens, located in the grounds of the old mill. Here you can sit outside and enjoy the barbecue/hog roast chalet and bar area. There's also a rooftop lounge with excellent views across the surrounding countryside.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: The village is located just north west of Hull where you can visit the famous Humber Bridge and Humber Bridge Country Park. The popular Hessle Foreshore Walk and the Barton Upon Humber Walk can also be picked up near here. For more walking ideas in the area see the Yorkshire Wolds Walks page.

display_address: Mill Road, Skidby, East Riding of Yorkshire, England, HU16 5TE, United Kingdom
